    <item> 
      <title>Inquiry into Hillsborough 'spin' claims</title>  
      <description>The police watchdog launches an investigation after a former South Yorkshire Police press officer claimed she was asked to "spin" news during the Hillsborough inquests.</description>

      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 21:33:17 GMT</pubDate> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Call for Tory election letters probe</title>  
      <description>Police are asked to investigate claims that letters sent in David Cameron's name in the 2015 general election campaign led to a breach of election law.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-36284335#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Factory blaze sets off firework display</title>  
      <description>A huge blaze breaks out at a factory, setting off dozens of fireworks stored inside.</description>

    <item> 
      <title>High Court to rule on term-time holiday</title>  
      <description>The case of a father who refused to pay a Â£120 fine for taking his daughter on an unauthorised term-time holiday is due to be heard by the High Court.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/education-36277940#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/education-36277940</guid>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Woman killed by car in police chase</title>  
      <description>A 33-year-old woman in Edinburgh dies after she is hit and killed by a car being pursued by police.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-36283552#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-36283552</guid>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>PPI victims 'should have got Â£5bn more'</title>  
      <description>Twelve million consumers who were mis-sold Payment Protection Insurance (PPI) should have got an extra Â£5bn, a group of MPs has said.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-36278064#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Scots judo star injured in Vietnam crash</title>  
      <description>Scottish Commonwealth Games judo medallist Stephanie Inglis is in a coma and fighting for her life after a motorbike accident in Vietnam.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-36283543#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Ban on unhealthy food adverts pondered</title>  
      <description>A complete ban on advertising unhealthy foods to children is being considered by the industry's self-regulatory body as a way to reduce childhood obesity.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-36283138#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-36283138</guid>  
      <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:53:48 GMT</pubDate> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Hundreds evacuated in WW2 bomb scare</title>  
      <description>Hundreds of people spend the night away from their homes after a suspected unexploded World War Two bomb is found at a former school in Bath.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-somerset-36279782#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Legal highs blamed for brothers' deaths</title>  
      <description>A family speaks out about the dangers of so-called "legal highs" after losing two brothers to the drugs in just three years.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-scotland-36278908#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Mock terror attack 'not scripted'</title>  
      <description>The chief constable of Greater Manchester Police says a counter-terrorism exercise in which the phrase "Allahu Akbar" was used was not scripted.</description>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>UK banks shut 600 branches in last year</title>  
      <description>More than 600 bank branches have closed across the UK in the last year, with rural areas worst affected, according to figures obtained by the BBC.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-36268324#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>GP's memoir reveals 'shy' Dylan Thomas</title>

      <title>'Crumbling' WWI graffiti to be preserved</title>

      <title>Defoe aiming for England Euros call-up</title>  
      <description>Sunderland striker Jermain Defoe tells BBC Radio 5 live he is still hopeful of being in the England squad for Euro 2016.</description>

      <title>De Boer 'right man' for Everton job</title>

      <title>Labour and Plaid set to hold talks</title>
